text: The following lists events that have happened in 1898 in the Qajar dynasty, Iran. ==Incumbents== * Monarch: Mozaffar al-Din Shah Qajar ==Birth== * January 21 – Ahmad Shah Qajar the last king of Qajar was born in Tabriz (d. 1930 in France) ==References== Iran Category:Years of the 19th century in Iran Category:1890s in Iran Iran
title: 1898 in Iran
